DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study characterize quality life ( QOL ) longitudinal pattern change QOL outcome child youth HIV infection ; identify demographic , social , disease status , treatment , health care utilization factor predict longitudinal change outcomes ; develop conceptual model characterize effect specific factor predict longitudinal change QOL ; characterize influence HIV symptom QOL outcomes domains health perception , physical , psychological , social role functioning .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Children With HIV Infection
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase III study . This study use national data available prospective , observational , longitudinal study child youth ( n=1,993 ) birth 25 HIV infection ( Pediatric AIDS Clinical Trials Group Protocol 219/219C ) develop knowledge quality life ( QOL ) factor affect order able implement effective nursing intervention clinical program support improve QOL vulnerable population child .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Children youth perinatally acquire HIV infection Enrolled PACTG 219/219C Completed quality life assessment Exclusion criterion HIV expose , infect
